Title: Slaughterhouse Rulez
Writer: Crispian Mills (screenplay by), Henry Fitzherbert (screenplay by), Luke Passmore (story by), Crispian Mills (story by), Henry Fitzherbert (story by)
Actors: Margot Robbie, Michael Sheen, Asa Butterfield, Finn Cole
Plot: An illustrious British boarding school becomes a bloody battleground when a mysterious sinkhole appears at a nearby fracking site unleashing unspeakable horror.
